mapper.select: select dar.id, dar.name, dar.enabled, dar.rule, dar.template_id, dar.rule_type, dar.trigger_conditions, dar.description, dat.name as template_name, dat.template_content from dinky_alert_rules dar left join dinky_alert_template dat on dar.template_id = dat.id where dar.enabled = 1

select a.* from dinky_alert_rules a
and a.name like "%${param.name}%"
and a.create_time >= str_to_date( #{param.createTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.update_time >= str_to_date( #{param.updateTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and
${ew.sqlSegment}
